website_summaries.verdict: Though the Creative Vado HD 3rd Gen doesn't do quite enough to distinguish itself from the competition, it does offer some nice improvements over earlier Vado HD models that keep it relevant in the pocket camcorder space.
pros: compatible with both OS X and Windows
cons: Software will only run if the device is attached

customer_reviews.title: Great camcorder at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The VADO VF0624 Camcorder with 2x Optical Zoom and 2-inch LCD Screen is a great buy especially if you are looking for an inexpensive camcorder. It's a good buy for the following reasons. High definition 720P pocket video camcorder and 4GB of video storage capacity Fits easily in your pocket purse or the palm of your hand One touch recording with a spacious 2 inch display and touch capacitive buttons Record up to two hour of HD video footage at 30 fps Works with PC and Mac HD 720p video 4GB video/photo capacity Records 120 minutes video. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: clarence jackson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Controls, Bad LCD Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this just for creating YouTube videos however sent it back within an hour of receiving it. The touch controls are so terrible it was almost impossible to adjust the settings and use the camera at all. Once I finally got it setup and recording I noticed the LCD doesn't even show the entire recorded field of view which makes it difficult to make sure everything you need is in the cameras view. I would not recommend this camera at all until they correct the controls and ensure everything that is displayed on the LCD screen is actually in the recorded video.
customer_reviews.author: BorntoVenture

customer_reviews.title: Creative Vado Latest Generation
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this off amazon. Came very fast. Great little available light camcorder that has interchangeable batteries you can buy off amazon for $4 aftermarket- brands that work great-read the reviews. Compared to other brands, this camcorder was the best for available light and hd video quality on my sharp LED tv. Very happy with purchase and size (small) of camcorder and ease of keeping it on hand when I need it with a couple spare batteries so I know I will always be able to capture what I want. Has a 1/4 thread on bottom to attach to a bike or tripod. Purchased a leather case that fits this camera and protects it well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: after reading ALL the reviews I was so confused and ready to give up on any mini cam. I went ahead and bought it. To sum up my experience so far,,, all the bad reviews are just out of line. As far as no software for editing, most computers have software that functions fine with the VADO. There is also a ton of software available to buy on-line for about 30 dollars. The touch pad is NOT too sensitive. The photo quality was better than the reviewers. stated. In Summary,, the bad reviews are just whiny from spoiled brats. It was an excellent product and very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Carnrick  at Pirate Palms

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk won't even turn on.
customer_reviews.text: This camera will not turn on. Yes, I have the battery in correctly, yes I've charged the battery. I read on a comment forum that many other people have this same problem with this piece of junk...it won't turn on. That seems like a pretty elemental requirement for a camera...that you be able to turn it on. I am sick and tired of getting ripped off by manufacturers of junk like this. And try and contact the manufacturer for help. What a joke. I will never buy another piece of Creative Labs junk again.
customer_reviews.author: hannah6

customer_reviews.title: No Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one Creative Vado 3rd Generation camcorder early last week. After inserting the battery in the correct orientation and charging it overnight, I disconnected the camcorder from the USB cable, and the camcorder would not power on. The screen stayed completely blank. So, I returned it and ordered a second unit. It arrived late last week. Lo and behold, charged it overnight, unplugged it from the computer USB charging cable, pressed the on/off switch and ... nothing. Nada. Blank. Two new units, both dead on arrival. The quality of this product is just terrible.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one 3rd. Generation Vado HD pocket camcorder which looked fine,recommended by PC World Magazine worked for 10 minutes during testing and then went dead. Did all the right things like re-charging, taking battery out and replacing same etc.. But that was it. Also heaven help a non-techie from trying to arrange the settings etc. because the operation lit which came with the product is minimal. Also Creative labs on line were not helpful at all. Also noted that when zooming the zoom did not stay at proper magnification. It was returned and will not be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: The Fozz

customer_reviews.title: charging is an issue
customer_reviews.text: if i could charge it then i could use it, i have ordered a wall charger to see if that resolves the issue. the camera only works when attached to the computer which is a ridiculous way to use it. it will not charge on a mac or pc usb connection. attempting for the 4th time to charge it using express mode. if the wall charger does not allow the device to fully charge then i will return all items ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: E.G.

customer_reviews.title: Do your research
customer_reviews.text: After reading the mostly-good reviews on Amazon, I purchased the VADO 3G (not refurbished) for my daughter's birthday. It was very cute and light-weight. We followed all instructions to charge the unit before use. Could not get it to turn on. Only worked when plugged in to an outlet- the picture was fantastic! Did some troubleshooting research and deeper-digging into product reviews on-line and found out that many people have had the same problem with this model, among other issues (software incompatabilities, voice-video sync issues, etc.). Had to return it. Sad! I had such high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmomama

customer_reviews.title: Vado VF06245 Camcorder
customer_reviews.text: Great camcorder. Very compact. Easy to use. Creative Labs having been in the stereo/audio arena for MANY years has followed in their tradition of providing useful and well built products. Reviewed many camcorder products from big name manufacturers prior to selecting this one based on the brand and the fantastic price point. Thanks Creative. Product arrived within a few days from order placement. Thanks to Amazon,a great place to shop.
customer_reviews.author: FLS

customer_reviews.title: Great camcorder
customer_reviews.text: i bought this based on the fact that i made lots of research on witch camcorder was the best and most of them said this one was a great buy and so they were right i love it does good on night and awesome in day light the HD is great and the audio was really good love it will so recommended to others!
customer_reviews.author: Yessica A. Malpica

customer_reviews.title: Lens not as wide as I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a camcorder with a wide lens this one does not fulfill all its promises. Do not get me wrong, the video is good for such a small device but for closeup videos it did not meet my needs. I mostly still have to use my compact digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: What a huge disappointment. My daughter was going to use this for a school project. The camera worked the first couple times that she used it, very briefly, and hasn't worked since. I had already bought many of the added accessories, so it was a huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: col

customer_reviews.title: Good piece...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mom and she still loves it...Simple and easy and she is 73 and needs simple and easy... I like the quality it puts out for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff P.

customer_reviews.title: Battery contained in the pack didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for vs the money that you paid. But Battery didn't work , I has to buy a new battery then my Vado HD work without problem. It was very frustrating for me , because I missed to record my holidays with my family. Other users in Amazon are reporting this bug, but Creative Labs is not taking action ; is just waiting for you to create a RMA. I sent an email to Creative Labs describing the problem; I will update my comments as soon I have the answer from Creative Labs. Regards
customer_reviews.author: fitohdz

customer_reviews.title: Handy Little Camcorder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pocket camcorder to replace a Flip Camera. Although the Flip is much more user friendly, the sound and HD picture on the Vado are far superior. My only complaint is that it didn't come with even a quick start user manual.
customer_reviews.author: Palbah

customer_reviews.title: I like it even though it is not high definition
customer_reviews.text: I like it even though it is not high definition, I like that it's is small and does the work, for what I need it, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonesa

customer_reviews.title: The cheapest camcorder with external mic
customer_reviews.text: I need a camcorder with an external mic input, and this does the job. I'd love better image quality and better performance in low light and more bells and whistles, but what I really need is the sound input and for that, I would recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Podur

customer_reviews.title: Vado
customer_reviews.text: This item was received in a timely manner and both my husband and myself are completely happy with this product. The color doesn't quite look right on the screen but once you put it on the computer it looks great without any touch ups.
customer_reviews.author: lourdess

customer_reviews.title: A good little camera
customer_reviews.text: A good little camera. I like the external mike option, which suits my needs. I also like that the camera has a replaceable battery, which makes it better than the flip video cameras I've used in the past. The batteries in flip video cameras die, which is why I was in the market for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Jane King

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is very picky about electronics! He loves it! Gives a great quality of picture, and is easy to carry around with you. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: audrey.o

customer_reviews.title: Great Pocket Camera
customer_reviews.text: Handy little camera which produces good pictures with fairly accurate color. A plus feature is a microphone input allowing a microphone to be used and eliminating that hollow effect of oncamera recording of audio.
customer_reviews.author: John Dinkmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Mine arrived dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Error message?! Took too long to wait for a return, my bad. Next time will test sooner. Turns on, but shows no image just error message. Got it used on AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: N. Kane

customer_reviews.title: This model construction and quality is very poor
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product I shocked to see the quality, very poor construction. I believe in creative products but this is very unsatisfied product.
customer_reviews.author: Ravinder Ramini

customer_reviews.title: Shipped with defective battery pack
customer_reviews.text: The camera functions well - but only when connected to a power source via the USB charge cable. The battery which came with the camera had no charge when it arrived. After charging for two days, the battery pack still would not hold a charge. (When the camera power button is pressed, the LCD screen barely makes a fizzle, then goes black again.) The camera simply won't turn on unless it is plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and great video quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm an amateur photographer. This summer, I have been shooting local rock bands and I wanted a dedicated video camera to capture their live audio and stage show (loud sound and low lighting). Everyone who has seen my band videos is amazed with the audio quality and video quality, even in low light. Wish it had 8 gig instead of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Pete N.

customer_reviews.title: Vado Pocket Video Camcorder/Camera
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to believe that the quality of this little camcorder is better than my Sony hand held camcorder and all for just over a $100. I would have saved $600 if this product was out 2 years ago. The HD quality is excellent and I love the built in USB connector so I can just plug strait in to the computer or TV with no cable.
customer_reviews.author: Brian from Bonney Lake

customer_reviews.title: i think refurbished means broken, mine did not recognize usb for charging and downloads
customer_reviews.text: i think refurbished means broken, mine did not recognize usb for charging and downloads i do not recommend this product. got a playsport for a few bucks more, it works
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: for the neophyte in technology
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small video/camera to take with me on vacation that would have more memory than my 4G phone. This product was easy to operate, produced good video and pictures. AND it fits into a small purse or pocket. It was easy to connect to my television and computer for viewing and transfer of photos. What a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to turn it on unintentionally
customer_reviews.text: On/off button is very sensitive. It is easy to turn it on unintentionally, resulting in a dead battery because you didn't realize it turned on as it was being put away.
customer_reviews.author: Chippenham

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I chose this over the flip camera and I am very pleased with it. It takes great photos and has high quality sound and video. Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: As good as it gets for 720p on a pocket cam, and for the price. Wide screen shot is the absolute best in its category. Don't be fooled by the people who complain about the controls--just operate it intelligiently and you won't have any issues. Good lowlight as well. I also had the 2nd generation Vado, and this is a step up.
customer_reviews.author: csmith

customer_reviews.title: power please
customer_reviews.text: i truely wish i could give you helpful and informative review but the fact is, the unit would not power up. i will admit it was discouraging. so i returned the product and that was the end of the story .
customer_reviews.author: jaun dean esquire

customer_reviews.title: D.O.A.
customer_reviews.text: I've seen reviews on this commenting on how the battery was bad and they had to get a new one before it would work. Mine also shipped with a bad battery that would not charge and so I sent the whole mess back. First impressions are important and DOA is not a good one for me. If my salad comes with a fly on it I don't move onto the main course. I upgraded to a Sony handicam and am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures and videos. Only problem is picture is blurry at times so I must take a 2nd picture to clear it up.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Charged the Vado when I received it. It would only turn on when connected to my computer. Would not turn on otherwise, so I was unable to use it at all. Bummer. On the positive side, the return process was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: K Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great but for the buttons
customer_reviews.text: I had the 2nd Gen and loved it. But I lost it. Bought the 3rd Gen and would return it if I hadn't thrown away the box. The video quality is great, but the buttons are way too sensitive and are flush with the the case and are way too sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I had an earlier model and was very excited to purchase this one with more recording time. It wonderful to have a video camera that can fit in your shirt pocket and still take high HD videos and photos.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Dobbins

customer_reviews.title: Control Bottons are messy!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to handle this camera without inadvertently selecting a function you had no intention of selecting. It is really messy. I returned the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Cool little high tech cam
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest cam great design,cool color (I have the purple), great image and sound capture. If your looking for a small and affordable cam this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good.
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about it. I thought that the battery might be bad, but it just needed a little extra charging time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME LITTLE CAMCORDER!
customer_reviews.text: My dad bought this thing for me last week, and it arrived with free shipping within 10 days. Awesome little gadget. My favorite part of this camcorder is the external microphone. I want to make movies with an external microphone and this thing lets you do that. It helps get exceptional sound quality. The camera does the job for any aspiring movie director. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: bprice14

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT TURN ON
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas Gift. It would never turn on. Spent alot of time with customer service, emailing in my amazon purchase information. I just hope to get my money back. I had high hopes for this product
customer_reviews.author: Fountains

customer_reviews.title: Product Support
customer_reviews.text: I can't comment on the product features or functions as my Vado HD did not work out of the box. Chasing down the warranty for my Vado has been an absolute labaryth of broken links and unclear proceedures. I have just managed to get this product registered, in order to get a RMA number, but the serial number is not being recognised! This should be simple! Registration and waranty should be linked and International Warranty should mean International. I whish i could rate the product itself, my research indicated that it should be good if not great, but so far I am dissapointed with 1) reciving a non-functioning unit, and 2) really poor warranty service.
customer_reviews.author: B. Magnusson

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: This Camcorder is hard to use, hold the thing in the wrong spot when you are taking a video a you screw it up , My phone takes better video
customer_reviews.author: Dave Z

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and quality is nice to.
customer_reviews.text: Got to say this is definitely a nice product for the price and the quality it shoots at. Has definitely filmed some great memories already and knowing that things will be in good quality definitely is a plus. Easy to use also nothing to crazy when it comes to menu and settings.
customer_reviews.author: ChuckNLV

product_meta.title: VADO VF0624 3G Camcorder with 2x Optical Zoom and 2-inch LCD Screen - CYAN
product_meta.description:
Color:CyanOne light touch on the touch-sensitive buttons and you can start recording instantly in high-definition quality. Lightweight and extremely compact, enjoy up to 120 minutes of widescreen HD quality video on the move. Don't cramp your style with additional camera equipment as the Vado HD (3rd Gen) comes equipped with a photo feature that lets you shoot up to 7,000 of widescreen still shots. The video enthusiast in you will be thrilled at how much more you can achieve with the multi-function jack and the improved Vado Central 3.0 software. With the multi-function port, you can connect a handy microphone to the Vado HD (3rd Gen) for better audio recording and come playback time, simply plug in your own headphones to listen to the videos at a desired volume level. Sharing your happy times with others truly does not come easier than this! «0;less

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
See it, shoot it, and share it--all in high definition. Creative Lab's third generation Vado HD Pocket Video Camera (Black) makes it easier than ever to record outstanding video in 720p high-definition quality. Featuring a new, ultra-stylish design, the Vado HD is slim enough to fit in your pocket, yet its 4 GB memory capacity holds up to 120 minutes of widescreen HD-quality video. With instant one-touch recording and included Vado Central 3.0 software, you'll be watching, sharing, and editing outstanding video with ease. 

 


Vado HD, 3rd Generation
At a Glance:  * 4 GB of memory for up to 120 minutes of HD quality video recording
 * Vado Central 3.0 software for easy video posts to Facebook, YouTube, and more
 * Built-in USB cable


One-click video upload support for: 


The small, stylish Vado HD lets you record up to two hours of HD video. Capture Life in Gorgeous HD
The Vado HD features a unique high-quality lens that lets you capture widescreen HD-quality video in up to 1280 x 720p. It can also take still photos--simply switch into photo mode to capture HD-quality still photos. With 4GB of onboard memory, the Vado HD can hold up to 2 hours of HD video or up to 7000 HD still captures. Because it records in the H.264 and AAC recording formats, you'll get outstanding video quality at ultra-efficient file sizes.

Other cutting-edge features include a wide-angle lens that lets you capture more action than other cameras, plus you have full control over manual exposure adjustments, so you can adjust for great video quality no matter if the scene is brightly lit or dim. For recording and instant playback, a bright two-inch LCD screen provides crisp visuals.

Vado Central Software Makes it Easy to Share
With the included Vado Central 3.0 software, you'll have an easy way to view, share, and even edit your videos. The software's user-friendly layout provides you with a clean, organized view of all your videos, as well as quick access to relevant functions such as copying, sharing, and emailing. Creative has made posting videos to websites such as Facebook, YouTube, Photobucket, or Box.net as simple as a single mouse click. Now you can take videos during your vacation and load them onto your Facebook page on the fly.

Vado Central 3.0 also includes basic video editing capabilities so you can quickly polish your videos before posting them. The software's trimming function lets you delete raw footage by choosing new starting and ending points for a clip, and then saving the improved version. And since the Vado HD takes videos in standard video formats, you can easily export them to programs such as iMovie and Movie Maker for more advanced editing options.

 

The included Vado Central 3.0 software for both PC (pictured above) and Mac (below) makes posting videos to Facebook and YouTube as easy as clicking a button. Compact, Stylish Design with Rechargeable Battery
With its glossy black looks and sleek, slim, portable design, the Vado HD ensures that you'll never miss a shot, no matter where you are. The Lithium-ion battery offers up to 2 hours of recording and playback, and is easily recharged via the built-in USB. For added convenience, the removable battery gives you the option of carrying a spare for extended recording and playback.

HDMI Output for Easy Viewing
With the Vado HD, video playback is simple, even when you're away from your computer. Simply connect your Vado HD to an HDTV with an HDMI cable (sold separately) and you'll be enjoying your videos in 720p HD quality.

Built-In USB Cable
Thanks to Creative Labs' smart design, the Vado HD's flexible, pull-out USB cable is built into the camera so it's always accessible. Connect it to your PC or Mac no matter where you are and you'll be sharing your videos in no time.

Multi-Function Port for Extra Flexibility
With a multi-function port built into the Vado HD, you'll have added flexibility when it comes to recording and playback. For improved audio, a stereo microphone can be connected to better capture sound during recording. For private listening in a public place, you can plug in a pair of headphones. And for playback, you can connect an analog AV cable to output videos onto a non-HDMI display.

The Vado HD is compatible with both Macs (Mac OS X 10.4 and later) and PCs (Windows 7, Vista, or XP (SP2)).

The Creative Labs Vado HD Pocket Video Camera is backed by a one-year limited warranty.

What's in the Box
Vado HD video camera, rechargeable Lithium-ion battery, and quick start guide.




Accessories for your Vado HD Lithium Ion Battery Rechargeable Battery Charger Waterproof Pouch Mesh Pouch Tripod
feature_bullets: High definition 720P pocket video camcorder with 4GB of video storage capacity
Fits easily in your pocket purse or the palm of your hand
One touch recording with a spacious 2 inch display and touch capacitive buttons
Record up to two hour of HD video footage at 30 fps

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars103 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
